1242.content:
Luke did not really have an opinion on what useful form he would took. So he just grabbed the closest item, which was the glass of milk.

“I wonder why any of the food makes a difference?”, thought Luke as he chugged down the contents of the glass.

“So, what’s it going to be?”, asked Luke. “Are you going to make me smarter? Maybe stronger? I guess I don’t really know what kind of body you will find useful.”

“Oh, you’ll be quite strong. I guess you could say you’ll be way smarter than any of your companions.”, said his Mom with a smirk. She grabbed the empty glass from the table and stood up.

“Come with me Son. It’s time to make you a more productive member of society. You’ll be working with your Uncle Teddy for the next month. He has mentioned a few times that he could use a little more help around the farm. First, have a seat in the circle inscribed on the floor.”

Luke sat in the circle and waited patiently for his Mom to gather up her spell components. He was actually kind of excited and wondered what his new body would look like.

His Mom placed a few odd items into the glass and began a few incantations. The glass glowed momentarily and the items disappeared from sight.

“Now, listen carefully Son. You give yourself over to my will, voluntarily and without reservation?”

“Sure Mom.”, responded Luke.

“Now, let’s talk about your month of service. I suggest that we reevaluate your form every month, as I see fit. Will you allow me to find more useful forms every time you’ve fulfilled your month of service? You will still be able to choose whether or not you want to comply.”, said his Mom as she forced down a smile.

“Yeah Mom. It would suck if I could only help out with one thing. I understand if you want to change me into something more useful after the month is up.”

“Good! Now, just relax and close your eyes.” After a brief pause, Luke heard the words... “Luxor ellum varistanta!”

Luke felt a tingle go through his entire body. It felt like every nerve was hyper aware. The feeling was quite euphoric and he was disappointed that it was over so quickly.

“That’s it?”, said Luke as he looked himself over in the mirror. “I don’t look or feel any different.”

“Yes, the deal is sealed. No turning back now. Remember, you said that you wanted a slow transformation. Besides, it will be hard to transport you once the transformation is complete. I’ll call your Uncle so he can prepare for your arrival.

Luke thought that was an odd thing to say, but just shrugged his shoulders and went to grab a drink and some snacks for the road.

Luke kept walking around the back yard, trying to adjust to his new “useful” body. He couldn’t believe that he was stuck as a dairy cow for the next month. He should have been a bit more careful and weighed in on his transformation.

“What shall we call you now? Hmmmm... How about something traditional and reminds you of your new gender. Betty Sue! Yes, that is a wonderful name. Okay, let’s go over some of the details before your uncle gets here. You’re stuck like that for a month, give or take a few days.”

“Mrrrrooio?”, questioned Luke.

Well, I never said 30 days. Today is the first day of the month, so as long as I change you by the last day of the next month, I’ve lived up to my end of the bargain. Also, that spell has a few side effects. You are irresistible to any male member of your species. You can thank me for that one when I come back to get you.”

Luke shook his head.

“Yeah, say what you want, but you’ll get curious sooner than later. The body also makes sex extremely pleasurable. Once you give in, you won’t be able to get enough of Stanley. He may be up there in years, but he’s a prize winning bull and his semen goes for a really high price on the market. I bet the two of you could make some very healthy calves!”

“I won’t go that far! I might be in the body of a cow, but that doesn’t mean I need to act like one.”, thought Luke. “There’s no way I’m going to let Stanley mate with me.”

“Part of that spell lets me read your mind. Don’t kid yourself. Sex is sex and you’ll find it quite pleasurable. Trust me.

1242311.content:
Luke’s uncle opened the trailer and helped him down the ramp. Luke could see a couple of cows grazing in the field who looked up lazily at the newcomer briefly before losing interest and reached for more grass.

“Off you go Betty Sue!“, said his uncle as he opened the gate and slapped him on the rump. “That’s one fine udder you have there! I bet I’ll get twice the amount of milk out of you girl!”

Luke, accepting his situation, started to graze with the other cows. His new body felt so cumbersome as every move seemed to jostle his massive girth. The sway of his udder was a constant reminder of his new purpose. It wasn’t long before he ran into Stanley, his uncle’s prize bull.

“What is that intoxicating smell!?”, thought Luke as he tried to track down it’s source. It didn’t take him long to find a rather large bull standing about 20 feet behind him. Luke, remembering what body he was in, immediately turned to face the bull so he could track his movements. The last thing he wanted was to get fucked like a big dumb animal. He still had his self respect and was not going to submit himself to the bull.

“Look at the size of that thing!”, he thought as the bull jumped on the cow’s back and started pumping away. He casually imagined that was his body getting fucked and felt a tingle run through his body. The thought held on to him and wouldn’t let go. He suddenly wanted nothing more than to be Stanley’s next conquest. He licked his big cow lips as he waited for the bull to finish and come introduce himself to the newest member of his little harem.

info.description:
This first Story is going to be about a Mother that is tired of her son (Luke) not taking advantages that he has been given by giving them to someone else.

The second Story is about (Luke) the son that thinks that he could have a better life as someone else and goes to his mother, so she helps him out only she might give a twist on what he wants.

Hi, Everyone this is my first interactive story here on Writing.com please feel free to add to the chapters and make it your own. If you add something please try and make it a least a paragraph unless it needs to be shorter.
